output_list.criticism: The function getChampsByOwner does not check if the length of the array is within the bounds of the mapping. This can lead to out-of-bounds access and potential security vulnerabilities. The function should be modified to handle the case when the length of the array exceeds the number of champs in the mapping.

The function getItemsByOwner does not check if the length of the array is within the bounds of the mapping. This can lead to out-of-bounds access and potential security vulnerabilities. The function should be modified to handle the case when the length of the array exceeds the number of items in the mapping.

The function getChampsCount does not check if the length of the array is within the bounds of the mapping. This can lead to out-of-bounds access and potential security vulnerabilities. The function should be modified to handle the case when the length of the array exceeds the number of champs in the mapping.

The function getItemsCount does not check if the length of the array is within the bounds of the mapping. This can lead to out-of-bounds access and potential security vulnerabilities. The function should be modified to handle the case when the length of the array exceeds the number of items in the mapping.

The function getChampsForSale does not check if the length of the array is within the bounds of the mapping. This can lead to out-of-bounds access and potential security vulnerabilities. The function should be modified to handle the case when the length of the array exceeds the number of champs for sale in the mapping.
